channel.title: Imgui on Portfolio - Thomas Leroy
channel.description: Recent content in Imgui on Portfolio - Thomas Leroy

item.title: 0xed
item.description:
0xed is an hexadecimal editor. View data interpreted as common types such as ASCII, Integer and Float. Setup as many panels as you want, each with its own color gradient and data type. Inspect selected byte string with the Inspector panel, Search for any type of data with the search command. 0xed is currently being worked on and thus is not recommended for professional use as of now.
Album Progress album
